name: I'm A Pencil
description:
I'm a Pencil! (Created for NaNoRenO 2021 Jam)

This is a visual novel about a pencil. Yes, a freaking pencil!
HAHAH- but, seriously, no joke! It is literally about a pencil!

Game length: 15-30 minutes

. . . . . .

The visual novel was made by a solo developer for NeNoNeNoNeNo- I mean, NaNoRenO 2021 Jam (sorry for the lame joke). The jam is basically a challenge for devs to develop a visual novel from start to finish within a month! Anyways, "I'm a Pencil" tells a story of a pencil. Um, do I need to say more? Oh yes, I love coffee!

 BUY ME A HOT LATTE! 

. . . . . .

Features:

  • Pencil.
  • Eraser.
  • Sharpener.
  • Helicopter (yup!).
  • 4 Different achievements!
